snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [211] Michael Jackson's Moonwalker
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

Not as good as the Arcade original, but a reasonably fun game to play non the less.  The genesis renditions of the music are not bad either. 

 I cant help but feel they could have done more though and been more like the arcade version with it being made by sega afterall. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
